articles.title: Apple slashing iPhone 14 Plus production - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
Apple has cut production of its iPhone 14 Plus model following a lack of demand for the new model variant.

At least one of Apple's Chinese manufacturers halted production of the iPhone 14 Pus model parts, according to a report from The Information's Wayne Ma.
